structure.unit: PHYSICIANS, OSTEOPATHS, PODIATRISTS, AND RELATED MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS

law.catch_line: Issuance of birth and death certificates for live-born child after attempted abortion.
law.text: Any child which is live born after an induced termination of pregnancy shall be fully recognized as a human person under the law and a birth certificate shall be issued certifying the birth of the live-born person even though the person may die thereafter. In the event death does ensue, a death certificate shall be issued. Both the birth and death certificates shall be issued as required by KRS 213.046, 213.051, and 213.076.
law.history: Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 369, sec. 36, effective July 13, 1990. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 9.
